DbSql.Text: SELECT TOP 1 a.OrderId, a.UserName, a.ProductId, b.Name AS ProductName, a.Quantity, a.OrderPrice, a.Indate FROM dbo.[Order] a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.[Product] b WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.ProductId=b.ProductId WHERE OrderId=@OrderId

SELECT a.OrderId, a.UserName, a.ProductId, b.Name AS ProductName, a.Quantity, a.OrderPrice, a.Indate FROM dbo.[Order] a WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.[Product] b WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.ProductId=b.ProductId WHERE UserName=@UserName
INSERT INTO dbo.[Order] (OrderId, UserName, ProductId, Quantity, OrderPrice) VALUES (@OrderId, @UserName, @ProductId, @Quantity, @OrderPrice)
SELECT Balance FROM dbo.[User] WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE Name=@UserName
UPDATE dbo.[User] SET Balance=Balance-@OrderAmt WHERE Name=@UserName
